title: Weird vision/fog of war stuff
body:
Without vision, you can hear enemy abilities?
I was playing Nunu, and I walked behind enemy red and heard amumu tantrum, so i walked around and found him at his red (stole it).
Also hearing enemy recalls when they are in the bush.

I also notice sometimes I have vision of people when I shouldn't. Like if lee sin jumps a wall, i keep vision of him for 1-2 seconds and no, there was no revealing "eyes" on him or anything like that.

Is this supposed to happen?

replies.body:
With fog on I believe you can still hear enemy abilities, and certain spell effects like flash can even be seen with fog on I think. At least I have seen a few of the examples to the situations I provided above.

I don't know whether it's bug or not tbh but this kind of thing has been here in the game for some time, we just got used to it as it happens sometimes.

EDIT: And some champ's spell effect will reveal enemy champ even though there is no eye icon above the target, ignite also reveals, you just kinda need to remember them. [LoLwiki - Sight](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Sight).
